description: Manx landlords will not be allowed to evict tenants for failing to pay rent until after 27 December.
title: Coronavirus: Manx eviction ban extended until December
title_page: Coronavirus: Manx eviction ban extended until December - BBC News
maintext: A ban on evicting tenants on the Isle of Man for falling behind on rent has been extended by six months, the Office of Fair Trading has said.
